question:
One does not generally associate teenagers with (i) ________. Jean, however, exercises a self-discipline that verges on (ii) ________. It is unclear whether this is a testament to a particularly conservative upbringing or a reaction against an excessively (iii) ________ one.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
Blank (iii)
A. silent obedience
D. asperity
G. illiberal
B. polished urbanity
E. punishment
H. permissive
C. practiced restrain
F. asceticism
I. meddlesome
Show
Hide
Answer
